settings.text: Vidlogix wants you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not satisfied for any reason, our return policy allows you to send back returns-eligible merchandise within 60 days of the delivery date for a refund of the purchase price, minus the shipping & handling.

settings.title: Return shipping is on PayPal when you checkout with PayPal.
settings.text: If you aren’t happy with your order, PayPal will provide a free return shipping label or refund the cost of sending it back on eligible purchases.

settings.title: Return instructions
settings.text: A Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number is required for all returns. RMA numbers are valid for 10 days. Unauthorized returns will be returned to the sender or recycled.
settings.text2:
Pack your items carefully since they are still your items until we have verified their functionality and physical condition. Please DO NOT treat the item box as the shipping box.

Ensure that there are no other tracking labels attached to your package. If you are shipping a non-hazardous item, completely remove or cover any hazardous materials markings.

Affix the mailing label squarely onto the address side of the parcel, covering up any previous delivery address and barcode without overlapping any adjacent side.

Take this package to a USPS location (mailbox, post office, etc.). Store hours are subject to change due to COVID-19 precautions, please confirm opening hours before proceeding. To find your closest USPS location, visit the USPS Locator or go to www.usps.com.

settings.title: Refund status
settings.text:
Know that returns and credits can take up to ten (10) business days from the time the merchant accepts them to the time they post to your account—and show up in your balance.

In most cases, once a refund has been submitted, the issuing bank will post it to your account within 3-5 business days when issued to a credit card. Refunds issued to a bank account or pin-less debit typically take 10 business days to reflect on the account balance. This time frame may vary from one financial institution to another.

If you don't see the refund posted to your account, please contact your issuing bank for further assistance. Your bank can clarify how long it'll take them to post the refund. If your bank has trouble locating the completed refund, please contact our billing specialists so they can investigate why this may be happening.

settings.title: Warranty policy
settings.text:
All items sold by Vidlogix are warranted solely by the manufacturer ("vendor"). All items needing repair should be sent to the vendor directly for service. Vidlogix is not liable if the vendor fails to perform warranty service.

Vidlogix is pleased to offer a free extended warranty identical to the provisions and limitations of the vendor's warranty for such items, with the exception of the term, which is equal to one (1) year. If we can’t replace or repair your item, we’ll repurchase it at market value. No-fuss. No muss.

THERE IS NO IMPLIED WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ON ANY ITEM SOLD BY VIDLOGIX.

Vidlogix will not be responsible for any consequential or incidental damage resulting from the sale or use of any merchandise purchased from us. Vidlogix’s liability is limited to the monetary value of the merchandise.

settings.title: Important details
settings.text:
If the product is returned unopened, unused, undamaged, and in the original packaging, we will offer a refund of the purchase price, minus the shipping & handling and return label fee, which refund will be made by crediting the account used to make the original purchase. The refund amount indicated is an estimate based on the full invoice price; however, the actual amount refunded may be adjusted to account for any discounts, promotions, sales tax differences, deductions, credits , and/or restocking fees pertaining to your order. 

Refundable – Factory sealed, shrink-wrapped, unopened, unused, undamaged items in the original packaging are refundable within 60 days of delivery. Damaged/defective items will be replaced (subject to availability) upon inspection. Vidlogix does not issue advanced replacements. The fastest way to receive a replacement is to make a new order. Damaged goods or shortages must be reported within five (5) days of receipt of goods.

Non-refundable – The money-back guarantee excludes kitchen appliances, personal protective equipment (PPE), hard disk drives (HDD), software, clearance, special order, televisions, and unsealed (inner & outer seals) items. Damaged/defective items should be sent to the manufacturer for service. Vidlogix is not liable if the manufacturer fails to perform warranty service.

Return shipping fees – We do not pay for returns unless the item is damaged, defective or incorrect. If you have received a damaged, defective or incorrect item please contact us and we will arrange the return for you. If you wish to return your item for another reason, e.g. 'the item is unsuitable' then please arrange postage yourself. Vidlogix can issue one (1) return shipping label per order for a flat-fee of $12 (< 10 lbs). Return shipping fees are deducted from your refund.

Restocking fees – All returned merchandise must be in the same condition as sold, with all included accessories. If condition differs, we reserve the right to refuse the return or to charge a restocking fee of 20%.

Undeliverable – We're unable to update or cancel an order once it ships. Return shipping fees are deducted from your refund. Contact us to arrange a return.
